reqs:
Pre-reqs: MUSC 119 and one of MUSC 100, MUSC 110. (Permission of instructor is also required.)
Prerequisite: MUSC 119 and one of MUSC 100, MUSC 110. Permission of instructor is also required.
courseName: Introduction to Electroacoustic Music - INTRO ELECRO MUS
description: Study of acoustics, audio technology, and electroacoustic composition. Composition of original works using facilities of the UBC Electroacoustic Music Studio.
